Package jsyntaxpane

Interface Summary
Lexer Lexers must implement these methods.
 

Class Summary
CompoundUndoMan A revised UndoManager that groups undos based on positions.
DefaultSyntaxKit The DefaultSyntaxKit is the main entry to SyntaxPane.
JavaRegexKit  
SyntaxDocument A document that supports being highlighted.
SyntaxStyle This class represents the Style for a TokenType.
SyntaxStyles The Styles to use for each TokenType.
SyntaxTester  
SyntaxView  
Token A Token in a Document.
TokenComparators Two comparators to compare Tokens.
TokenConstants Constants used by Tokens.
 

Enum Summary
TokenType These are the various token types supported by JSyntaxPane.
